rules_text:
[i]Dream of Eternity[/i] – At the beginning of each opponent’s upkeep, that player may pay {1} and scry 1. If they don’t, destroy all creatures.
[i]Game Over[/i] – At the beginning of each opponent’s upkeep, that player may pay {1} and put a +1/+1 counter on Nuclear Options. If they don’t, destroy all creatures.
